 11  universes u v w x
 12  variables {α : Type u} {β : Type v} {γ : Type w} {ι : Sort x} {a a₁ a₂ : α} {b b₁ b₂ : β}
 13  
 14  /-- A Galois connection is a pair of functions `l` and `u` satisfying
 15    `l a ≤ b ↔ a ≤ u b`. They are closely connected to adjoint functors
 16    in category theory. -/
 17  def galois_connection [preorder α] [preorder β] (l : α → β) (u : β → α) := ∀a b, l a ≤ b ↔ a ≤ u b
id                          └──────┘ ┴   └──────┘ ┴       ┴   ┴       ┴   ┴      ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴
src                         └──────┘     └──────┘                                         ┴   ┴   ┴
typ                         └──────┘ ┴   └──────┘ ┴       ┴   ┴       ┴   ┴      ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴
 18  
 19  /-- Makes a Galois connection from an order-preserving bijection. -/
 20  theorem order_iso.to_galois_connection [preorder α] [preorder β] (oi : @order_iso α β (≤) (≤)) : 
id                                           └──────┘ ┴   └──────┘ ┴         └───────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴   ┴
src                                          └──────┘     └──────┘           └───────┘     ┴   ┴
typ                                          └──────┘ ┴   └──────┘ ┴         └───────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴   ┴
doc                                                                          └───────┘
 21    galois_connection oi oi.symm :=
id     └───────────────┘ └┘ └┘└───┘
src    └───────────────┘      └───┘
typ    └───────────────┘ └┘ └┘└───┘
doc    └───────────────┘
 22  λ b g, by rw [order_iso.ord' oi, order_iso.apply_symm_apply]
id     ┴ ┴         └────────────┘ └┘  └────────────────────────┘
src            └──┘└────────────┘┴  └┘└────────────────────────┘└─

116  section semilattice_inf
117  variables [semilattice_inf α] [semilattice_inf β] {l : α → β} {u : β → α} (gc : galois_connection l u)
id              └─────────────┘     └─────────────┘                                  └───────────────┘

187  /-- A Galois insertion is a Galois connection where `l ∘ u = id`. It also contains a constructive
188  choice function, to give better definitional equalities when lifting order structures. -/
189  structure galois_insertion {α β : Type*} [preorder α] [preorder β] (l : α → β) (u : β → α) :=
id                                     └───┘   └──────┘ ┴   └──────┘ ┴       ┴ ┴ ┴       ┴ ┴ ┴
src                                            └──────┘     └──────┘
typ                                    └───┘   └──────┘ ┴   └──────┘ ┴       ┴ ┴ ┴       ┴ ┴ ┴
190  (choice : Πx:α, u (l x) ≤ x → β)
id              ┴ ┴  ┴  ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴   ┴
src                          ┴
typ             ┴ ┴  ┴  ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴   ┴
191  (gc : galois_connection l u)
id         └───────────────┘ ┴ ┴
src        └───────────────┘
typ        └───────────────┘ ┴ ┴
doc        └───────────────┘
192  (le_l_u : ∀x, x ≤ l (u x))
id              ┴  ┴ ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴
src                  ┴
typ             ┴  ┴ ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴
193  (choice_eq : ∀a h, choice a h = l a)
id                 ┴ ┴  └────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴
src                                ┴
typ                ┴ ┴  └────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴ ┴
194  
195  /-- A constructor for a Galois insertion with the trivial `choice` function. -/
196  def galois_insertion.monotone_intro {α β : Type*} [preorder α] [preorder β] {l : α → β} {u : β → α}
id                                                      └──────┘ ┴   └──────┘ ┴       ┴   ┴       ┴   ┴
src                                                     └──────┘     └──────┘
typ                                                     └──────┘ ┴   └──────┘ ┴       ┴   ┴       ┴   ┴
197    (hu : monotone u) (hl : monotone l) (hul : ∀ a, a ≤ u (l a)) (hlu : ∀ b, l (u b) = b) :
id           └──────┘ ┴        └──────┘ ┴           ┴  ┴ ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴            ┴  ┴  ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴
src          └──────┘          └──────┘                  ┴                              ┴
typ          └──────┘ ┴        └──────┘ ┴           ┴  ┴ ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴            ┴  ┴  ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴
doc          └──────┘          └──────┘
198    galois_insertion l u :=
id     └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴
src    └──────────────┘
typ    └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴
doc    └──────────────┘
199  { choice := λ x _, l x,
id                 ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴
typ                ┴ ┴  ┴ ┴
200    gc := galois_connection.monotone_intro hu hl hul (λ b, le_of_eq (hlu b)),
id           └──────────────────────────────┘ └┘ └┘ └─┘    ┴  └──────┘  └─┘ ┴
src          └──────────────────────────────┘                 └──────┘
typ          └──────────────────────────────┘ └┘ └┘ └─┘    ┴  └──────┘  └─┘ ┴
201    le_l_u := λ b, le_of_eq $ (hlu b).symm,
id                 ┴  └──────┘    └─┘ ┴ └──┘
src                   └──────┘          └──┘
typ                ┴  └──────┘    └─┘ ┴ └──┘
202    choice_eq := λ _ _, rfl }
id                    ┴ ┴  └─┘
src                        └─┘
typ                   ┴ ┴  └─┘

204  /-- Makes a Galois insertion from an order-preserving bijection. -/
205  protected def order_iso.to_galois_insertion [preorder α] [preorder β] (oi : @order_iso α β (≤) (≤)) : 
id                                                └──────┘ ┴   └──────┘ ┴         └───────┘ ┴ ┴ ┴   ┴

id    └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴      └┘   └┘└───┘
src   └──────────────┘                 └───┘
typ   └──────────────┘ ┴ ┴      └┘   └┘└───┘

src            └───────────────────┘

id                                                       └───────┘ ┴   └───────────┘ ┴
src                                                      └───────┘     └───────────┘
typ                                                      └───────┘ ┴   └───────────┘ ┴
